name: World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra
description:
This is the new updated wide-screene version of my World Heroes Supreme Justice Extra game at 05.02.2018. This is a beat 'em up style game like Final Fight.

Now the game is fully compatible with the more recent OpenBOR_v3.0_Build_4153 (included in download).
This version includes a lot of bug fixes and tweaks as well.

-You can check the moves list on "How To Play" in the game menu, or in the "moves_list.txt" for more.
-Be sure to configure the game buttons on : OPTIONS/CONTROL OPTIONS

-Have fun!!

action

This game is made by maggas: https://gamejolt.com/@magggas

Download:
https://www.majorgeeks.com/files/details/world_heroes_supreme_justice_extra.html
